data.title: [Solved] Who is called "Akbar of Bengal"?
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is Alauddin Husain Shah​.


	 Alauddin Husain Shah, the founder of the Husain Shahi dynasty, occupied the throne of Bengal by ass
data.text:
-> The Staff Selection Commission conducts the SSC JE 2024 exam to recruit Junior Engineers in different disciplines under various departments of the Central Government.

-> A total of 788 vacancies have been announced.

-> The selected candidates can apply online from 28th March to 18th April 2024.

-> The selection process of the candidates for the SSC Junior Engineer post consists of Paper I, Paper II, Document Verification, and Medical Examination.

-> Candidates who will get selected will get a salary range between Rs. 35,400/- to Rs. 1,12,400/-.

-> Candidates must refer to the SSC JE Previous Year Papers and SSC JE Civil Mock Test, SSC JE Electrical Mock Test, and SSC JE Mechanical Mock Test to understand the type of questions coming in the examination.
